input: Gillis e nyí Mattias sín tɔ́ é flín ɖɔ Ninɔmɛ ɔ byɔ suúluɖiɖo tawun .
target: Byadusabaga kwihangana cyane .

input: Ninɔmɛ ɔ vɛwǔ nú Ellen tawun .
target: Ibyo bituma Ellen avunika cyane .

input: É ɖɔ É byɔ suúluɖiɖo tawun kpo ɖɛ gègě xixo kpo .
target: Binsaba kwihangana no gusenga cyane .

input: É ɖɔ gɔ́ na ɖɔ Wemafɔ Biblu tɔn e un yí wǎn na hugǎn bɔ é nɔ dó gbɔ nú mì é wɛ nyí Filipunu lɛ 413 ,finɛ ɖɔ Mɛ e nɔ na hlɔnhlɔn mì ɔ wɛ nɔ zɔ́n ,bɔ un nɔ sixu kpé nǔ enɛ lɛ bǐ wu .’
target: Umurongo umpumuriza ni uwo mu Bafilipi 413 ,‘ Mu bintu byose ,ngira imbaraga binyuze ku umpa imbaraga . ’

input: Hwenu e Nɔví Young wá Lisbonne ɖò avivɔ hwenu 1925 tɔn é ɔ ,é mɔ hunnyahunnya sín nùɖé .
target: Igihe Umuvandimwe Young yageraga i Lisbonne mu mwaka wa 1925 ,yasanze hari imidugararo .

input: Huzuhuzu sín acɛkpikpa 1910 tɔn ɖó nǔ acɛkpikpa e ɖò ayǐ é nu ,bo bló bɔ Sinsɛn Katolika tɔn ba acɛ e é ɖó é gègě kpò .
target: Impinduramatwara y’abaharaniraga repubulika yari yarabaye mu mwaka wa 1910 ,yari yaravanyeho ubutegetsi bwa cyami kandi yambura Kiliziya Gatolika ububasha .

input: Enɛ gudo ɖò 13 mai ɔ ,azǎn e gbè è bló tuto bɔ Nɔví Rutherford na xwlé xóɖiɖɔ tɔn mɛ é kpé .
target: Hanyuma itariki ya 13 Gicurasi ,umunsi Umuvandimwe Rutherford yagombaga gutangira disikuru ,yarageze .

input: Ðò septembre 1925 ɔ ,è jɛ Atɔxwɛ ɖetɔ́n dó Portugal - gbè mɛ jí ɖò Portugal .
target: Muri Nzeri 1925 ,Umunara w’Umurinzi mu Giporutugali watangiye gucapirwa muri Porutugali .

input: Wema e na acɛ Lizzie Ferguson kpo Virgílio Ferguson kpo bɔ ye na nɔ tò ɔ mɛ é ,1928
target: Uruhushya rwo gutura muri Porutugali rwahawe Virgílio Ferguson na Lizzie ,mu wa 1928

input: Ðò octobre 1927 ɔ ,è na gbè tɔn ɛ .
target: Barumuhaye mu Kwakira 1927 .

input: Ðò acɛ gannaganna kpa nú mɛ ɔ sín xwè nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ ,gbɛtɔ́ 450 mɔ̌ na nyikɔ ɖò Portugal ,bo na nɔ yí Atɔxwɛ .
target: Mu mwaka wa mbere w’ubwo butegetsi bw’igitugu ,abantu bagera hafi kuri 450 bo muri Porutugali basabye ko bajya bahabwa Umunara w’Umurinzi .

input: Ðò 1934 ɔ ,Nɔví Ferguson kpo asì tɔn kpo ɖó na lɛkɔ yì Brésil .
target: Mu mwaka wa 1934 ,Umuvandimwe Ferguson n’umugore we basubiye muri Burezili .

input: Hwenu e acɛkpikpa ɔ tlɛ gbɛ́ azɔ̌ Kúnnuɖetɔ́ Jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ ɖò 1962 é ɔ ,nukɔnyiyi kpò ɖò tíntíìn wɛ .
target: Nubwo mu mwaka wa 1962 umurimo w’Abahamya ba Yehova wabuzanyijwe ,bakomeje kwiyongera .

input: Ðò égbé ɔ ,mɛɖé lɛ ɖò wɛnjlatɔ́ enɛ lɛ mɛ bo nyí kúnkan mɛ ɖěɖee yì xóɖiɖɔ manawɔn Rutherford tɔn 1925 tɔn ɔ tɛnmɛ é ɖé lɛ tɔn .
target: Bamwe muri abo babwiriza ni abuzukuruza b’abumvise disikuru yatanzwe n’Umuvandimwe Rutherford mu mwaka wa 1925 .

input: Mǐ dokú nú Jehovah gɔ́ nú nɔví sunnu kpo nɔví nyɔnu kpan gbejinɔtɔ́ nukɔn nukɔntɔn enɛ lɛ e kpankɔ́n ,bo nɔ nukɔn bo bló bɔ azɔ̌ ɔ gbakpé ,lobo nyí mɛsɛntɔ́ Klisu Jezu tɔn ɖò akɔta lɛ tɛntin é . Hlɔ . Nǔ Xóxó Sɛxwetɛn Mǐtɔn Portugal Tɔn .
target: Dushimira cyane Yehova n’abo bavandimwe na bashiki bacu b’indahemuka ,bagize ubutwari bagafata iya mbere mu murimo wo kubwiriza ,ari ‘ abakozi ba Kristo Yesu bakorera amahanga . ’ — Rom . Byavuye mu bubiko bwacu muri Porutugali .
